text: Hitobito no naka, shinko no nai choro-tachi wa itta. `Nanda kore wa, anata gata to onaji tada no ningende wanaidesu ka. Kare wa anata gata no ue ni, takaku tomaritai nodeshou. Moshi arra ga o nozominara, kare wa tenshi o tsukawasubekidesu. Watashi-tachi wa, mukashi no sosen kara mo, Konna koto wa kikimasendeshita
